job.title: Data Engineer - Machine Learning
job.description:
io173 is partnered with multiple Management Consulting firms to scale up their Data Engineering teams supporting Machine Learning for advanced analytics solutions. Our client's primary focus is on end-to-end development of analytics solutions and their deployment at scale.


Qualified candidates will have experience in Machine Learning Operations/Data Engineering building end-to-end data Pipelines for ML consumption. Experience outside ML Data Engineering is a plus but you MUST have experience on ML projects.


Required Experience:

2-5 years experience in MLOperations/ML Data Engineering developing end-to-end data pipelines for machine learning solutions.

Experience in distributed computing, specifically putting PySpark code into production.


Core Required Skills:

Python programing- Advanced

SQL- Advanced

PySpark- intermediate to Advanced


Expectations:

This role will require approximately 40-50% travel to meet with client teams.

Must be located in a location commutable to one of our client's major hubs: Boston, Atlanta, Chicago, New York City.


We will not consider C2C candidates for this role, only direct-hire candidates.


io173.com acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment. By applying for this job you accept the Terms &Condition's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at io173.com
